c301.AdventureBook.Models

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • c301.AdventureBook.Models.Page
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Page
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This is the Page model class. There can be many pages within a story. The model allows authors to set a page title and description, and add options to the page.
    Author:
    tyleung
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Page

        public Page(String title,
    String pageDescription)
        The constructor for the Page model class. It creates a new page with the given title and description. It also initializes the options list.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the page
        pageDescription - the page description
